alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 3:24AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Collier and central Hendry Counties through 430 AM EDT... At 324 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Big Corkscrew Island, or 7 miles west of Immokalee, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Montura, Immokalee, Golden Gate Estates, Felda, Orangetree, Hendry Correctional, Devils Garden, Big Corkscrew Island, Sunniland, Bunker Hill, Keri and Lake Trafford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
